verses.verse: Then he cried <S%H7121><s%> in mine ears <S%H241><s%> with a loud <S%H1419><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Cause ye them that have charge <S%H6486><s%> over the city <S%H5892><s%> to draw near <S%H7126><s%>, every man <S%H376><s%> with his destroying <S%H4892><s%> weapon <S%H3627><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And behold <S%H8337><s%>, six men <S%H582><s%> came <S%H935><s%> from the way <S%H1870><s%> of the upper <S%H5945><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>, which lieth <S%H6437><s%> toward the north <S%H6828><s%>, every man <S%H376><s%> with his slaughter <S%H4660><s%> weapon <S%H3627><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>; and one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of them clothed <S%H3847><s%> in linen <S%H906><s%>, with a writer <S%H5608><s%>'s inkhorn <S%H7083><s%> by his side <S%H4975><s%>. And they went in <S%H935><s%>, and stood <S%H5975><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> the brazen <S%H5178><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> was gone up <S%H5927><s%> from the cherub <S%H3742><s%>, whereupon it was <S%H4670><s%>, to the threshold of the house <S%H1004><s%>: and he called <S%H7121><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> in linen <S%H906><s%>, who had the writer <S%H5608><s%>'s inkhorn <S%H7083><s%> by his side <S%H4975><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H5674><s%>, Go through the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, through the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, and set <S%H8427><s%> a mark <S%H8420><s%> upon the foreheads <S%H4696><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> that sigh <S%H584><s%> and that cry <S%H602><s%> over all the abominations <S%H8441><s%> that are done <S%H6213><s%> in the midst thereof <S%H8432><s%>.

And to the others <S%H428><s%> he said <S%H559><s%> in my hearing <S%H241><s%>, Go <S%H5674><s%> ye through the city <S%H5892><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him <S%H5221><s%>, and smite: let not your eye <S%H5869><s%> spare <S%H2347><s%>, neither have ye pity <S%H2550><s%>;

slay <S%H2026><s%> utterly <S%H4889><s%> the old <S%H2205><s%> man <S%H970><s%>, the young man and the virgin <S%H1330><s%>, and little children <S%H2945><s%> and women <S%H802><s%>; but come not near <S%H5066><s%> any man <S%H376><s%> upon whom is the mark <S%H8420><s%>: and begin <S%H2490><s%> at my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>. Then they began <S%H2490><s%> at the old <S%H2205><s%> men <S%H582><s%> that were before <S%H6440><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H2930><s%>, Defile the house <S%H1004><s%>, and fill <S%H4390><s%> the courts <S%H2691><s%> with the slain <S%H2491><s%>: go ye forth <S%H3318><s%>. And they went forth <S%H3318><s%>, and smote <S%H5221><s%> in the city <S%H5892><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H5221><s%>, while they were smiting, and I was left <S%H7604><s%>, that I fell <S%H5307><s%> upon my face <S%H6440><s%>, and cried <S%H2199><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Ah <S%H162><s%> Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>! wilt thou destroy <S%H7843><s%> all the residue <S%H7611><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in thy pouring out <S%H8210><s%> of thy wrath <S%H2534><s%> upon Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>?

Then said <S%H559><s%> he unto me <S%H5771><s%>, The iniquity of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and Judah <S%H3063><s%> is exceeding <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%>, and the land <S%H776><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%>, and the city <S%H5892><s%> full <S%H4390><s%> of wresting <S%H4297><s%> of judgment <S%H559><s%>: for they say, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath forsaken <S%H5800><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> seeth not <S%H7200><s%>.
And as for me also <S%H5869><s%>, mine eye shall not spare <S%H2347><s%>, neither will I have pity <S%H2550><s%>, but I will bring <S%H5414><s%> their way <S%H1870><s%> upon their head <S%H7218><s%>.

And behold <S%H376><s%>, the man clothed <S%H3847><s%> in linen <S%H906><s%>, who had the inkhorn <S%H7083><s%> by his side <S%H4975><s%>, reported <S%H7725><s%> the matter <S%H1697><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, I have done <S%H6213><s%> as thou hast commanded me <S%H6680><s%>.
